definition[0]: the practice of burying waste under the ground, or the waste buried in this way
definition[1]: a place where waste is buried under the ground
definition[2]: the practice of burying waste from industry and homes in large holes in the ground, or the waste buried in this way
example[0]: The chemicals were trucked and used as landfill.
definition[3]: a place where waste is buried
example[1]: Typically, used oil is dumped into landfills.
example[2]: For every tonne of household waste that is disposed of through a landfill site, the council pays Â£13 in tax.
